name: Annoying Little Brother
quote: "You better take me with you, or I'm telling mom you're a bloodsucking vampire!"
abilities: May not use Guns. May not be the target of Creature attacks.
title: Subterranean

name: Space Bounty Hunter
quote: "See that cute thing? It'll eat your face."
abilities: Printed Defense = 8 during Alien attacks.
title: Grave Robbers

name: Big Dumb Jock
quote: "Dude! Beer me!"
abilities: When the Big Dumb Jock is killed, he goes to the bottom of the deck, rather than the graveyard.
title: Crypt

name: Skippy the Wonder Dog
quote: "What's that Skippy? Billy's torso is down the well?"
abilities: May not use Props, unless they're Clothing.
title: Sinister

name: Baby Sitter
quote: "$6.75 an hour and unlimited fridge privileges is not worth DYING FOR!"
abilities: Base Defense = 4 if cast in the same movie as Annoying Little Brother. Gains +2 Defense from each Young Character in the same movie.
title: Night

name: Aged Vampire Hunter
quote:
"The cardinal rule of hunting vampires is that one
vampire is much easier to kill than ten."
abilities: Printed Defense = 6 against Vampire attacks.
title: Satanic

name: Park Ranger
quote: "You'd be surprised how much a grizzly bear's roar can sound like, 'Help! I'm being murdered by a chainsaw-weilding psycho!'"
abilities: Base Defense = 5 in any Natural location.
title: Mysterious

name: The Guy Everyone Knows Will Get Killed
quote: "I know there's a killer on the loose, so I'm going to wander around in the dark..."
abilities: If there is ever a choice of Male Characters to kill by any means in your movie, this guy must be chosen.
title: Radioactive

name: Janitor
quote: "You wouldn't believe the things some people throw away..."
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn to take any Prop out of the Graveyard and give it to the Janitor for free. Ignore his Prop limit.
title: House

name: High School Vice Principal
quote: "I've had just about enough of your antics, Billy... say is that a tentacle?"
abilities:
If in the High School, he MUST be the target
of Creature attacks and lethal Special Effects, unless The Guy Everyone Knows Will Get Killed is cast in the movie.
title: Heathen

name: Spoiled Little Rich Girl
quote: "Billy may have come camping with YOU, but he's coming home with ME... Or in a body bag..."
abilities: Your hand limit is increased by 1 while she is cast in your movie.
title: Vampire

name: Bookish Girl With No Boyfriend
quote: "No, that's okay, you guys go skinny dipping. I'll just stay here and read..."
abilities: Gets +2 Defense from each Book Prop she possesses.
title: Virgin

name: Robot
quote: "I may be only a robot, but you cannot Ctrl+Alt+Del my heart."
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn to save one of your Young Characters who has just been killed.
title: Massacre

name: Nymphomaniac Cheerleader
quote:
"Give me an O! Give me an O!
O-O-O-O YES!"
abilities: All Males cast in the same movie gain +1 Defense.
title: Woman

name: Creepy Old Innkeeper
quote: "I guess you'll be wantin' to take a shower?"
abilities: May be played as a Psycho Killer with an Attack Strength of 8 + the number of Female Characters in the defending movie.
title: Devil

name: Beat Cop
quote: "To protect and sever... That's an unusual motto."
abilities: Gains twice the bonus from Gun Props. May be played as a Psycho Killer with an Attack Strength of 10.
title: Cyborg

name: Big Sister
quote: "Because mom left ME in charge, that's why! Now where's the machete?"
abilities: Gains +2 Defense if in the same movie as the Annoying Little Brother.
title: Attack

name: Grampa
quote: "What did I tell you kids about playing with dead things? AFTER your homework is done!"
abilities: While Grampa and at least one Young Character are in your movie, you may pay 3 Popcorn to stop an attack made against your movie.
title: Hell

name: Teenaged Hoodlum
quote: "I'll stand on your lawn if I want to, old man!"
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for each weapon he is carrying. Loses -1 Defense for each Old Character in the same movie.
title: Tunnel

name: Post Apocalyptic Highway Warrior
quote: "I'd be mad, too, if I had to wear old tires like that."
abilities: Gains +2 Defense for every Vehicle in the same Movie.
title: Army

name: Stoner
quote: "Dave's not here, man..."
abilities: May be played into an opponent's movie.
title: Fearsome

name: Wasteland Cyborg
quote:
"Metal Fleshman of Garbage Country?"
"Well, it loses something in translation..."
abilities: Gains +3 Defense if in a Scientific Location.
title: Skull

name: Mom
quote: "Come here, baby. Momma's gonna make it all better..."
abilities: Gains +1 from each Young or Family Character cast in the same movie. May be played as a Psycho Creature with an Attack of 8 + 1 for each Young Character in the target Movie.
title: Mars

name: Hapless Alien Visitor
quote: "Take me to your bleep-blorp-darn this translator unit!"
abilities: Printed Defense = 6 during Alien attacks.
title: Sacrifice

name: Fortune Teller
quote: "I look into your future and see... GAK! ARGH! GURGLE..."
abilities: Whenever you are drawing cards draw 2 extra, then put any 2 cards from your hand back on top of the draw pile.
title: Spell

name: Coed Science Major
quote: "How do we stop this thing?" "Why are you asking ME?" "You are the one with all the degrees, aren't you?"
abilities: When this card leaves play, put the top 3 cards of the deck into the Graveyard.
title: Girlfriend

name: Prom Queen
quote: "The pig's blood really brings out her eyes."
abilities: Prom Queen cannot be targeted by a Creature attack unless her movie is in the High School.
title: Rampage

name: Military Officer
quote: "You're out of uniform, soldier. Unpolished boots, blood on your coat. Is that brain caught between your teeth?"
abilities: You may issue the Military Officer two Props each turn so long as one is a Weapon.
title: Beyond

name: Old Priest
quote: "Holy Christ, you scared the bejesus outta me!"
abilities: Printed Defense = 6 during Supernatural attacks.
title: Maniac

name: Reporter
quote: "Can you confirm the reports of a giant lizard running amok? ... Chrissy? We're live... Chrissy?"
abilities: Once per turn on your turn you may draw one card for each player in the game, including yourself. Give one of them to each player.
title: Revenge

name: Nervous Girl
quote: "You SAY it's going to be okay, but YOU DON'T KNOW! Billy said the same thing and look what happened to him!"
abilities: When attacked, you may pay 2 Popcorn to force Nervous Girl to become the target of the attack.
title: Witch

name: Arachnophobia
quote: "A phobia is an irrational fear. There is NOTHING irrational about fearing these creepy-crawly bastards!"
title: Alien

name: Blob Monster
quote: "J-E-L-L-Uh oh!"
abilities: Gains +1 strength for each Character in the movie it is attacking.
title: Haunted

name: Space Critters
quote: "Awwww! It's so cute, yes it is... AAAAAAH! It ate my face!"
abilities: If defeated by a movie with a Young Character in it, that movie keeps this card as a Character with Defense = 4 and the trait Smart.
title: Sorority

name: Zombies From Hell
quote: "I thought we weren't using the Z-word..."
abilities: The Attacker may choose to give them the trait Supernatural.
title: Clutches

name: Carnivore Slugs
quote: "Ewwwww! Why is my seat all slimy?"
title: Dreadful

name: Pod People
quote: "Join us... Join us... C'mon just join us already!"
abilities: Instead of killing a victim, if the Pod People are successful, you steal all of the defending player's Characters.
title: Swarm

name: Teenaged Wolfman
quote: "Boys, when they hit a certain age, start experiencing... changes."
abilities: Always succeeds in Neighborhood Locations.
title: Evil

name: Space Mimic From Uranus
quote: "Don't worry, buddy. I'm right behind you!"
abilities: If successful, the Mimic becomes the Character in the victim's Movie with the lowest printed Defense (attacker chooses if there are multiple options). At the end of that player's turn, it kills its target and becomes the next-lowest until there are no more Characters, and it dies.
title: Secret

name: Killer Toys
quote: "It's a DOLL! Just kick it into the closet and close the door!" "We can do that?"
abilities: If the Toys fail, put them back into your hand instead of the Graveyard. You may not use them again this turn.
title: Space

name: Grave Robbers From Outer Space
quote: "Stupid Earthlings! See how they bury their dead instead of harvesting the parts for science...and SOUP!"
abilities: Gains +1 strength for every Character in the Graveyard at the moment the attack was launched.
title: Forbidden

name: The Gym Teacher
quote: "Everyone knows you don't become a gym teacher unless Satan tells you to."
abilities: Attacking player must declare whether the Gym Teacher is Alien or Psycho. Always succeeds when attacking the High School.
title: Forbidden

name: Mad Scientist
quote: "And they called me MAD at the community college...!"
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the current strength of an attack.
title: Dungeon

name: Vampire Beach Babes
quote: "Gotta love a girl with an oral fixation..."
abilities: Attacker may declare them Aquatic if desired. Beach Babes always succeeds at The Beach.
title: Murder

name: Evil Robot
quote: "FUMIGATE! FUMIGATE!" "Don't you mean 'exterminate'?" "WHATEVER!"
abilities: If the Evil Robot succeeds in attacking a movie with the Robot in the cast, the Robot must be the target.
title: Fang

name: Crazed Doctor
quote: "Life is a terminal illness... And the only cure is death."
abilities: Always succeeds when attacking the Insane Asylum.
title: Mask

name: Brain Slug Zombies
quote: "It only hurts a little, when the slug burrows into your brain..."
title: Hound

name: Council of Deranged Fascists
quote: "For the greater good." "The greater gooood."
abilities: Attack = 20 when attacking a Neighborhood location.
title: Vs.

name: Horde of Little Monsters
quote: "So this guy buys a little monster for his kid as a Christmas gift? Top notch parenting."
abilities: Gains +2 Attack for each Prop in the target Movie.
title: Thirteen

name: Genetically Monsterized Organism
quote: "Half human, half snake. All Manaconda!"
abilities: You may add any Creature traits you like to the GMO when attacking. Each trait adds +5 Attack.
title: Phantom

name: Severed Body Parts
quote: "If those are your hands, whose hand is ON MY THIGH???"
abilities: After this attack is resolved, put this card on the bottom of the deck.
title: Pagan

name: Say, is That a Tentacle?
quote: "I didn't order the calamari... GAH! ARGH! GURGLE!"
abilities: After this attack is resolved, the attacker may put the top 3 cards of the deck into the Graveyard.
title: Tentacle

name: Dracula
quote: "Make mine a Bloody Mary. Or a Bloody Sally. Hell, I'll even take a Bloody Steve at this point! I'm famished!"
abilities: If an attack with Dracula is successful, discard a Creature from your hand to take Dracula back into your hand.
title: Dracula

name: Subterranean Cannibals
quote: "Anybody else think this clown tastes funny?"
abilities: If this attack is unsuccessful, put the top 2 cards of the deck into the Graveyard. If successful, but the top 5 cards into the Graveyard.
title: Brain

name: Mummy
quote: "Just look at how beautifully preserved he... GAK! ARGH! GURGLE!"
abilities: The Mummy automatically succeeds when attacking the Tomb.
title: Hitler

name: Masked Stalker
quote: "Is that a chainsaw in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me? Oh it's a chainsaw... AAAAAAAAAH!"
abilities: All players may play Weapon Props to boost the Masked Stalker's Attack for free.
title: Coed

name: Bloodsucking Fiends
quote: "Is that guy sparkling?" "Yeah... he's not with us."
abilities: May be played for free if joining another Vampire card.
title: Damned

name: Roll The Credits 1
quote: "Keep watching the skies..."
title: Beach

name: Roll The Credits 2
quote: "Look! Sunlight! We made it!"
title: Blood

name: Roll The Credits 3
quote: "The end... or is it? But..."
title: Lizard

name: Roll The Credits 4
quote: "The bad guy's dead and none of this blood is mine, so it must be over..."
title: Supernatural

name: LaBORatory
quote: "It's alive. ALIVE!!!"
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn on your turn to bring a Character back from the dead. They are now Dumb, and can't use any Props but Clothing.
title: Invaders

name: Tomb
quote: "The inscription reads, 'All who enter the sacred resting place of Ra-tep shall suffer most hideous death.' Okay, let's go in."
abilities: Printed defense = -5 during Supernatural Attacks.
title: Terror

name: Back Seat of the Car
quote: "Billy, noooo. Stop it... Well okay, just this once... Say, is that a tentacle?"
title: Boyfriend

name: Alien Headquarters
quote: "SHHHHHH!" "I didn't say anything." "That wasn't me. I think it was the door..."
abilities: Printed Defense = -5 against Alien attacks.
title: Intergalactic

name: Old Church
quote: "We're on a mission from God..."
abilities: Immediately after filling your hand, discard a card from your hand or discard the Old Church. It is automatically discarded if you ever skip a turn.
title: Unholy

name: Sewer
quote: "It's moments like this that I think I have to reexamine my lifestyle choices..."
abilities: Subterranean attacks always succeed in the Sewer.
title: Grasp

name: College Campus
quote: "It's not the Student Body that bothers me... it's all the student bodies."
abilities: Can be combined with the Sorority House. Printed Defense = 6 if any College Character is present.
title: Grasp

name: Trailer Park
quote: "Why are we trying to save these people again?"
abilities: All Family Characters in this location gain +1 Defensive Strength.
title: Cult

name: Secret Government Lab
quote: "Has this door always been here?" "Sure." "What about the retinal scanner?"
abilities: May be combined with any non-Underground location.
title: Madness

name: Haunted Hotel
quote: "On a dark desert highway..."
abilities: The Axe's Printed Defense = 8 in the Haunted Hotel. Creepy Old Inkeeper always succeeds when attacking this location.
title: Invisible

name: Old Nuclear Test Grounds
quote: "The mutants around here pronounce it "nuke-u-lar."
abilities: Whenever a Monster attack is made at the Testing Grounds, any player(s) may add a Monster Creature of their own to the attack.
title: Bite

name: Cabin in the Woods
quote: "Did we leave the door open?" "Must have been the wind."
abilities: Printed Defense = -4 against Psycho attacks.
title: Grave

name: Insane Asylum
quote: "Attention patients: Lithium is no longer available on credit."
abilities: On your turn you may pay 2 Popcorn to use one of your Characters as a Psycho attack against another Movie. The Character is always returned to your Movie afterwards.
title: Sub-Human

name: Lovers' Lane
quote: "Looks like a parking lot. Since the bowling alley shut down there really isn't anything else to do in this town."
abilities: May be combined with the Back Seat of the Car. Psycho attacks always succeed at Lovers' Lane.
title: Rage

name: Basement
quote: "Hmm, I wonder what's down here..."
abilities: The Basement can't stand on its own. It must be connected with another Location. Printed Defense = -1 during Psycho Attacks.
title: Invisible

name: Abandoned Building
quote: "Looks spooky, but maybe they have a phone." "Yeah, a spooky phone."
abilities: When this card leaves play, put it and 5 random cards from the Graveyard on the bottom of the deck.
title: Mutant

name: High School
quote: "I'm not going back there! That place is full of mutants and monsters!" "But darling, you have to. You're the principal."
abilities: Printed Defense = 5 if you have cast the High School Vice Principal.
title: Orgy

name: Sorority House
quote: "Teehee! Let's have a pillowfight in our underwear!"
abilities: Defense = -3 during Psycho attacks.
title: Teenage

name: House By the Cemetery
quote: "What's it like living next to a cemetery?" "Quiet. Usually..."
abilities: Defense = -3 during Zombie or Vampire Attacks.
title: Undead

name: Camp Lake Zirconia
quote: "I've never seen a summer camp with its own morgue before." "You wouldn't believe how often it comes in handy..."
abilities: Psycho attacks always succeed at the Camp.
title: Return

name: Fun House
quote: "Doot-do-do-do-do Doot-do-do-do."
abilities: On your turn, you may pay 3 Popcorn to swap one of your Characters (with their Props and Special Effects) for another player's (with their Props, etc.).
title: Carnival

name: First Aid Kit
quote: "I've never treated a chainsaw wound to the head before, but what the hell... Hand me the iodine!"
abilities: Discard from your Movie to bring a Character back from the dead and cast them in your Movie for free.
title: Creature

name: Old Pickup Truck
quote: "Who's got the keys?" "Billy." "Aaaaand would this be Billy's severed head in the toilet?"
abilities: Any time your movie loses one or more Props, you may give one of them to the owner of the Pickup.
title: Satan

name: Explosives
quote: "EAT THIS!!!"
abilities: Discard Explosives during an Attack to give your Movie +15 Defense until the attack is resolved.
title: Atomic

name: Shotgun
quote: "Good... Bad... I'm the one with the gun."
abilities: On your turn you may either put the top card of the Graveyard under the deck OR put the top card of the deck into the Graveyard.
title: Part IV

name: Comic Books
quote: "This is just like the time Captain Pi√±ata fought the Zombie Queen!"
abilities: When held by a Young Character, Comic Books lets you pay 3 Popcorn to stop a Supernatural attack made against your movie.
title: Blob

name: Black Cloak
quote: "Like a Snuggie, but eeeeevil."
abilities: The Character wearing the Cloak may not be targeted by Creature attacks unless there is no other choice. Will not protect the Guy Everyone Knows Will Get Killed.
title: Liar

name: Mask
quote: "We all wear a mask at some time or another." "Yeah, but yours is covered in blood."
abilities: The Character wearing the Mask cannot be targeted by FX cards. The Masked Stalker automatically succeeds if he has the Mask.
title: Black

name: High Heels
quote: "Three days in a remote cabin and THESE are the shoes she wears?"
abilities: When on a Female Character, the Heels Printed Defense = -2. Can be played on an opponent's Character.
title: Moon

name: Row Boat
quote: "Row, row, row your boat, gently to your death."
abilities: Printed Defense = 6 when in an Aquatic Location.
title: Chamber

name: Recreational Vehicle
quote: "It may not be fast, but you should see the way it crushes zombies!"
abilities: Pay 4 Popcorn to stop one Zombie attack made against your Movie.
title: Witchcraft

name: Military Vehicle
quote: "4-wheel drive, bullet-proof plating... and 36 cup holders!"
abilities: A Character with the Military Vehicle can be given any number of Weapon Props in a single turn.
title: Warlock

name: Flashlight
quote: "Great! Now we can see it before it kills us."
abilities: The card "They Found the Fusebox" is immediately discarded from a Movie with the Flashlight in it.
title: Three-Headed

name: Spell Book
quote: "Why is it always Latin?"
abilities: If a Smart Character has the Book, you may pay 2 Popcorn to stop a Supernatural attack made against your Movie.
title: Demon

name: Toolkit
quote: "Let's see, I know I have one of those bastards in here somewhere..."
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn on your turn to take a Prop from the Graveyard and put it into your hand.
title: Ghost

name: Ouija Board
quote: "Come in Elvis! Are you there, Elvis?"
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn to stop a Supernatural attack made against your Movie.
title: Mansion

name: Rifle
quote: "What do you mean guns don't work?" BLAM! "Works for me!"
title: Tomb

name: Holy Relics
quote: "Holy water, silver bullets, crucifix... this thing's got everything. It's like God's Swiss Army knife!"
abilities: Defense = 4 during Supernatural attacks. (Or = 10 in the hands of the Aged Vampire Hunter, or = 12 with the Old Priest.)
title: Ritual

name: Chainsaw
quote: "Groovy."
abilities: You may play this with a Psycho attack to add +12 Attack Strength.
title: Scientist

name: Flamethrower
quote: "Now we're cooking with heat!"
abilities: Works against Swarm attacks.
title: Man

name: Book of the Dead
quote: "Klaatu! Berada!... Necktie..."
abilities: If the Book of the Dead is in a Movie, that Movie alone can be targeted by Zombie attacks.
title: Flesheating

name: Axe
quote: "Heeeeeeeeeere's Johnny!"
title: Fifty Foot

name: Pistol
quote:
BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! BLAM!
Click, click, click, click, click...
"Crap!"
title: Bride

name: Aim Fer the Head, Boys!
quote: "Eat lead, ya brain-slurpin' undead bastard!"
abilities: Play to stop a Zombie attack as long as the target Movie has at least one Gun Prop. Add +3 Defensive Strength against any attack for each Gun in the Movie.
title: Galaxy

name: Cut!
quote: "What do you mean we can't afford to do a second take?"
abilities: Stop one FX card as it is being played.
title: X-Ray

name: Director's Cut
quote: "MY movie does NOT need a voice over!"
abilities: Reverse the outcome of one attack after it has been resolved.
title: Scream

name: Editing Room Floor
quote: "But I swear, I'm in this movie!"
abilities: Remove any one card from any Movie.
title: Werewolf

name: Edjumicated
quote: "I gots me a diploma!"
abilities: Attach this card to a Character. They get +2 Defense and the trait Smart. If the Character had the trait Dumb, they no longer do.
title: Ancient

name: Flying Saucers
quote: "Actually, it's just a hubcap on some wire."
abilities: The current attack gains +3 Attack Strength or is doubled if it is Alien.
title: Planet

name:
Good God!
They're Radioactive!
quote: "Hey, turn out the light." "I already did..."
abilities: Double the current strength of a Creature.
title: Murder

name: Gotcha!
quote: "Oh look, the old 'fist out of the fresh grave' trick."
abilities: Stop a Roll the Credits card from ending the game.
title: Giant

name: Ha! Ha! Scared Ya!
quote: "You should see the look on your face..."
abilities: Stop one Creature attack. The Creature is returned to the attacking Player's hand and that Player may not make more attacks that turn.
title: Darkness

name:
Hey, What's Behind
This Door?
quote: "It's a fine line between stupid and clever."
abilities: Kill one Character who is either Smart or Dumb.
title: Vixen

name:
It Was a Dark
and Stormy Night
quote: "Oh great, purple lightning. That's never a good sign."
abilities: All attacks made until the start of your next turn are double strength. You may not be targeted by attacks during that time.
title: Terrible

name: Back to the Home
quote: "What are you doing way out here at this time of night, Gramps?"
abilities: Kill any one Old Character.
title: Demonic

name: It Was Only a Dream
quote: "And you were there, and you were there..."
abilities: Stop one attack.
title: Die

name: Let's Go Skinny Dipping
quote: "While we wait for Billy to get back, why don't we go for a swim?"
abilities: When playing this card, you must pay one Popcorn for each Young Non-Virgin Character in the target movie. They are now dead.
title: Thing

name: Let's Split Up
quote: "You stay here by yourself, and I'll go see what happened to everyone else..."
abilities: Play with a Creature. Single out one Character to be the intended victim of the current Attack. The Defense and abilities of all other Characters are ignored until the Attack is resolved.
title: Death

name:
Oh My God,
They Got Billy!
quote: "Billy, are you okay? Say something, pal." "Braaaaains!" "Say something else?"
abilities: Take a Character from the Graveyard and use it to make a Supernatural Zombie Attack with a strength double the Character's Printed Defense.
title: Curse

name: Only the Virgin Survives
quote: "Never have sex in a horror movie. EVER."
abilities: Kill a Male and non-Virgin Female Character in the same Movie.
title: Sucking

name: Over Budget
quote: "First day of filming and we're already out of money? You are SO fired!"
abilities: Stop one FX card as it's being played.
title: Nextdoor

name: Production Value
quote: "It's the cleavage. Monsters are distracted by cleavage."
abilities: Attach this card to a Female Character. She gains +2 Defense.
title: Claws

name: Pyrotechnics
quote: "The good news is that the zombies are afraid of fire. The bad news is I just dropped the torch on those oily rags over there..."
abilities: Destroy a Location. For each extra Popcorn you spend, kill one Character in that Movie.
title: Escape

name: Rayguns
quote: "What do you think this button does?"
abilities: Double of halve the strength of the current Alien attack.
title: Carnivorous

name: Reinforcements
quote: "I can control the Armies of the Dead? Cool!"
abilities: Double either the attacker or defender's current strength.
title: Howling

name:
But It Was Here Just a
Minute Ago
quote: "Never fear! Vampires can always be thwarted by... say, has anyone seen my holy amulet of Saint Shrivens?"
abilities: Remove one Prop from play.
title: Eyeball

name: Relentless
quote: Ch-ch-ch-ch! Ah-ah-ah-ah!
abilities: Play after a successful attack. You may immediately attack any Movie with that Creature again for no extra cost.
title: Mummy

name: Run Away!!!!
quote: "It's harder to kill a moving target!"
abilities: Give the defender +5 Defense for the current attack.
title: Caged

name: Scream Queen
quote: "You're not scared are you?" "Trust me, if I was afraid, you'd hear all about it."
abilities: Attach to a Female Character. While she's alive, her controller can spend 3 Popcorn to stop any attack made against her movie.
title: Zombie

name: The Money Shot
quote: "This is it. THIS is the one I'll be remembered for!"
abilities: Triple the strength of the current attack.
title: Tale

name: The Stars Are Right
quote: "The Prophesy! The time of darkness draws near!"
abilities: Double the current strength of a Creature attack and give it the trait Supernatural.
title: They

name: They Found the Fusebox
quote: "Oh great, he ate the light!"
abilities: Play on a Location. That Location's Printed Defense = -15. Remove from play if the Flashlight is in the same movie.
title: Keep

name: Three Picture Deal
quote: "Somebody has to survive for the sequel."
abilities: Attach this card to a Character to prevent them from being killed (no new Character may be chosen). They can no longer be targeted by Creatures from now on.
title: Alive

name: Too Stupid to Live
quote: "You're so stupid it's painful. Not to you, but to those around you."
abilities: Kill one Dumb Character.
title: Man-Eating

name: Underground Monsters
quote: "They're under the ground! They're under the gall-darned ground!"
abilities: Add +2 to the current attack or double it if it has the trait Monster.
title: Children

name: We Come In Peace
quote: "Awww! They're like little children." "How many children do you know who've mastered cold fusion and interstellar travel?"
abilities: Add +2 to the current defense, or stop one Alien attack. Put that Alien into your hand if you have the Military Officer in your movie.
title: Pit

name: Cabin Fever
quote: "I can't breathe! I've got to get out of here... GAH! ARGH! GURGLE!"
abilities: One Location's Defense = -3 until the end of the current Attack.
title: Doctor

name:
We've Seen Your Breasts
Now You Must Die!
quote: "Never canoodle in a horror movie. EVER."
abilities: Kill one non-Virgin Female Character.
title: Swamp

name: Why Won't You Die?
quote: "I guess getting mulched by a farm combine isn't as fatal as it used to be...."
abilities: After the current Attack is resolved, put the Creature into your hand.
title: Fear

name: Amphibious
quote: "Kiss it on the snout. Maybe it will turn into a prince." "Sure, a giant rampaging prince!"
abilities: Triple the strength of the current Aquatic Attack. Even though it is Aquatic, it can still target a Movie with a non-Aquatic Location.
title: Bloodthirsty

name: To Be Continued...
quote: "So it just stops and we have to wait a year for the ending? Somebody kill the director!"
abilities: Stop a Roll The Credits card from ending the game.
title: Frankenstein

name: Haunted
quote: "Cool! The walls paint themselves!" "That's not paint, idiot. It's blood."
abilities: Attach to a Location. That Location's Printed Defense = -7 against Supernatural Attacks.
title: Dead

name: Studio Interference
quote: "We have some notes..."
abilities: Pick any player. They discard their entire hand and draw an equal number of new cards.
title: Castle

name: Industry Legend
quote: "He must have lost a bet to be starring in this..."
abilities: Attach to a Character. That Character gains +2 Defense.
title: Nightmare

name: Campy 60s Crossover
quote: "Abbott & Costello meet the Blob? You've gotta be kidding me!"
abilities: You may play a Creature card to join the current Attack at no extra cost. The traits and special rules of both Creatures apply.
title: Shadow

name: Cat in the Closet
quote: "They even managed to pull this in Alien."
abilities: Stop any card as it is being played. This cannot stop Roll the Credits.
title: Monster

name: Chivalrous But Dumb
quote: "Does this mean I'm not getting any?"
abilities: Sacrifice one of your Male Characters to prevent one of your Female Characters from being killed.
title: Killer

name: Continuity Schmontinuity
quote: "Didn't that guy die like twenty minutes ago?"
abilities: Take a Character out of the Graveyard and put it into play in the Movie of your choice at no extra cost.
title: Meets

name: Cult Classic
quote: "I can't believe you haven't seen 'Teenage Blood Feast'..."
abilities: Draw two extra cards.
title: Unchained
